biotools.summary: Cambridge Cognitive and Psychiatric Test Kit (CamCOPS) an open-source application for capturing information relevant for cognitive and psychiatric assessment, on tablets, laptops, and desktops. It offers simple questionnaires and more complex tasks, and sends its data securely to your server.
